name: flesh roof
description: The meat of the roof here almost pulses as if in time with some gigantic heartbeat.

name: glowing liquid
description: A shallow stream of glowing yellow ichor pools on the floor here.  Peering into it, you can see dark shadows moving under the surface.

name: flesh wall
description: Warm to the touch, the tainted flesh of this monstrous being still twitches.

name: outgrowth of teeth
//: TODO: perhaps make player unable to bash these
description: A fractal array of uncountable, bristling teeth that seem impossibly sharp.  An iridescent haze surrounds it, as if light itself cannot help but be separated in their presence.  You surmise you could extract some for your own use, if you had an appropriate tool to remove them from the wall they're imbedded in.
